article_title: A Medical Bill You Can Understand

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: A simpler medical bill is the subject of a contest unveiled by the Obama administration to improve American's understanding of the healthcare services they are paying for, U.S. Secretary of Health and Human Services Sylvia Burwell said.
og.title: Obama's New Challenge: A Medical Bill You Can Understand
